name: This Fool
overview: Julio Lopez has a heart of gold and goes out of his way to help everyone but himself. Julio attempts to better his community, overcome his codependency issues with his family, and navigate working-class life in South Central.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: After Julio's job and love life blew up at the end of last season, new roommates Julio and Luis embark on finding new careers and romances with the help of Minister Payne, Chef Percy and other former Huggers.

episodes.name: A Storm is Coming
episodes.overview: Julio has a new client as a case worker at Hugs Not Thugs: His recently incarcerated cousin Luis, who used to bully him. Julio’s also got a new roommate… his recently incarcerated cousin Luis!

episodes.name: Putazos
episodes.overview: Luis can’t help but revert to his old ways when a former rival shows up and challenges him to a fight. Julio is conflicted on how to best help his cousin.

episodes.name: Emotional Timothy
episodes.overview: Julio takes a bold step forward in getting over his relationship with Maggie, while Luis seeks to gain closure from an ex with the help of Minister Payne.

episodes.name: Y Tu Julio También
episodes.overview: It’s Julio’s Birthday! And he’s miserable! And he misses Maggie! Luis struggles to understand why Julio hates his birthday and decides to force Julio to celebrate.

episodes.name: Sandy Says
episodes.overview: Luis’ antics land him in therapy, where he gets in touch with his deepest emotions for the first time, much to Julio’s chagrin.

episodes.name: Los Botes
episodes.overview: Luis finds himself in an unlikely alliance with Maria. Julio finds himself desperate to be thought of as a nice guy, with increasingly disastrous consequences.

episodes.name: Sh*t or Get Off the Pot
episodes.overview: Maggie takes Julio on a hike against his will, while Luis babysits Aiden and Michael. What could go wrong?

episodes.name: The Devil Made Me Do It
episodes.overview: Luis goes to great lengths to avoid atoning for his past sins. Meanwhile, it’s Aiden’s first communion and Julio isn’t too pleased with the choice of godmother.

episodes.name: F*ck the Rich
episodes.overview: With Hugs Not Thugs struggling financially, Julio helps Minister Payne court a pair of out-of-touch billionaires attempting to rebrand themselves.

episodes.name: A Fresh Start
episodes.overview: As Luis gets ready to move forward with his life by graduating from Hugs Not Thugs, Julio faces a big decision about his own future.

episodes.name: The Rooster
episodes.overview: Your people and my people

episodes.name: Clyde & Clyde (1)
episodes.overview: Some crazy shit happens

episodes.name: Clyde & Clyde (2)
episodes.overview: Some more crazy shit happens

episodes.name: Feel the Payne
episodes.overview: Cashews are the perfect meal

episodes.overview: Julio Jobs

episodes.overview: Buenos Aires

episodes.name: The Big Deal
episodes.overview: The thing with the jet fuel really happened

episodes.name: The Bigger Man
episodes.overview: I got bigger balls

episodes.overview: Babycakes

episodes.name: Two Fuckin' Losers
